title: Drawing, "Portrait Sketch of a Young Woman", ca. 1885
medium: Black crayon, white chalk, on green paper
provenance: Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters
creditline: Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters
description: Bust length portrait of a woman, her head turned sharply to the right, shown almost in profile, facing right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Portrait Sketch of a Young Woman", ca. 1885.
ca. 1885. Black crayon, white chalk, on green paper. Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters. 1955-38-58.
